name: Electrical and Computer Engineering
description: Electrical and computer engineering focuses on the study and application of electricity, electronics, and electromagnetism. It involves designing, developing, and testing electrical systems and computer technology.

name: Civil Engineering
description: Civil engineering deals with the design, construction, and maintenance of infrastructure projects such as roads, bridges, buildings, and water systems. It involves both technical and managerial aspects of construction projects.

name: Architecture
description: Architecture involves the planning, design, and construction of buildings and other structures. It combines artistic creativity with technical knowledge to create functional and aesthetically pleasing spaces.

name: English Philology
description: English philology is the study of the English language, including its history, structure, and literature. It encompasses linguistics, literary analysis, and language teaching.

University.name: University of Oxford
University.address: University Offices, Wellington Square, Oxford OX1 2JD

name: Korean Philology
description: Korean philology is the study of the Korean language, including its grammar, vocabulary, and literature. It explores the historical development and cultural context of the Korean language.
